      • removeFromList

        private void removeFromList(ArrayList<ClassificationUI> removeList)
        removeFromList Takes an ArrayList and then removes the members from the visible classifications. Used by contraction to contract all the levels when a top classification is closed.
        Parameters:
        removeList - the child classifications that are being removed
